ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and they will be beaten with cudgels made of iron.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: There are iron maces for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: There shall be maces of iron to lash them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will be subdued by iron rods.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And for them are rods of iron.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And for them are hooked rods of iron.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And for them are whips of iron.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: for them await hooked iron rods;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And for them are hooked rods of iron.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: There will be maces of iron for them;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And for them shall be maces of iron.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and there will be clubs of iron for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: In addition there will be maces of iron (to punish) them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And for them are hooked rods of iron (to punish them).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: for them are hooked rods of iron.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they will have maces of iron.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And for [striking] them are maces of iron.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [22:21] And there will be hooked rods of iron for them, for their heads to be beaten with.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And for them are hooked rods of iron) of hot rods of iron with which they will be hit on their heads. 365
